project_summary: A comprehensive, secure e-commerce platform with robust user management, product catalog, and advanced features supporting high performance and seamless user experience.

milestones.name: Foundation & User Management
milestones.description: Set up core infrastructure, user authentication, and initial system architecture

tasks.name: Project Setup
tasks.description: Configure development environment, version control, CI/CD pipeline

tasks.name: User Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement secure registration, login, password reset with two-factor authentication

tasks.name: Database Schema Design
tasks.description: Design and implement PostgreSQL database schema for users, roles, and permissions

milestones.name: Product Catalog & Search
milestones.description: Develop product management, catalog browsing, and advanced search capabilities

tasks.name: Product Management Backend
tasks.description: Create APIs for product CRUD operations, inventory tracking

tasks.name: Search & Filtering
tasks.description: Implement advanced product search, category filtering, and pagination

tasks.name: Product Image Management
tasks.description: Develop image upload, optimization, and CDN integration

milestones.name: Shopping Experience
milestones.description: Implement shopping cart, wishlist, and interactive product features

tasks.name: Shopping Cart System
tasks.description: Develop cart management, product addition/removal, price calculations

tasks.name: Product Reviews & Ratings
tasks.description: Create system for user reviews, ratings, and display mechanisms

tasks.name: Wishlist Functionality
tasks.description: Implement user wishlist creation, management, and interactions

milestones.name: Checkout & Payment
milestones.description: Develop secure payment processing, order management, and confirmation workflows

tasks.name: Payment Gateway Integration
tasks.description: Implement Stripe payment processing with multiple payment method support

tasks.name: Order Processing System
tasks.description: Create order tracking, status management, and email confirmation workflows

tasks.name: Security Compliance
tasks.description: Implement PCI DSS and GDPR compliance measures

milestones.name: Administration & Integrations
milestones.description: Build admin dashboard, third-party integrations, and final performance optimizations

tasks.name: Admin Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop comprehensive store management interface with role-based access

tasks.name: Third-Party Integrations
tasks.description: Integrate Google Analytics, Mailchimp, Zendesk, and social login

tasks.name: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Implement caching, CDN configuration, and performance monitoring

open_questions: What are the specific requirements for warehouse system integration?
Are there any specific payment methods required beyond Stripe?
What are the exact performance benchmarks for page load times?
Do we need support for international currencies and languages?
